content:
/>
III.ii.1.B.1.c
.
Safeguarding Records VA Receives From SSA
Although VA maintains the records it receives from SSA in a claims folder, release of these records or the information contained therein is restricted under the provisions of
38 CFR 1.521
.
Exception
:  Federal tax information (FTI) (or unearned income), received from SSA in the FTI match is the property of the Internal Revenue Service and requires additional safeguarding.
References
:  For more information on
FTI, see
M21-1, Part XIV, 4.A
, and
safeguarding FTI, see
M21-1, Part XIV, 4.B
.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section B - Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) Requests for Information From the Social Security Administration (SSA)
citation: Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section B
